author: baiumbg
ryan
short: Allow users to play TTS and SFX.
description: Allow users to play TTS and SFX.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing!

Note: This cog bypasses Audio's `[p]audioset restrict` setting when using join/leave sounds.

If you want to use the `[p]sfx` command, you'll need to make a FreeSound API application.

Go to https://freesound.org/apiv2/apply and make an account, and then submit a application.

After you've submitted the application, the credentials should have appeared onscreen. Run `[p]set api freesound id <client_id> key <api_key>` and you'll be all set.
